self.name: channels.toggleSlowMode
self.description: Toggle supergroup slow mode: if enabled, users will only be able to send one message every seconds seconds
self.descriptionExcerpt: Toggle supergroup slow mode: if enabled, users will only be able to send one message every...

arguments.name: seconds
arguments.description: Users will only be able to send one message every seconds seconds, 0 to disable the limitation

throws.description: You must be an admin in this chat to do this
throws.name: CHAT_ADMIN_REQUIRED
